name: Finest Back Bacon
description: High content of meat with succulent quality bacon taste. There's nothing like the flavour of salty, crispy bacon with creamy eggs. The combination is classic for a breakfast entrée or a sandwich. It is also a favourite for party time.     Please note that our team at Cargills Online has taken all the necessary precautions in order to deliver this item in its frozen state to your doorstep.  *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
